up_to: Our students' results up to TOPIK 6

item1.title: Professional teachers
item1.text: You will be taught by instructors with over 4 years of experience and a TOPIK level 6 qualification.

item2.title: Free coworking spaces
item2.text: We offer free coworking spaces for flexible learning, networking, and self-improvement.

item3.title: Weekly events
item3.text: The TOPIK Academy team regularly organizes additional events for students.

item4.title: Free mock exams
item4.text: Participate in monthly mock exams to track your progress and gauge your level.

item5.title: Supportive curators
item5.text: You will have a curator to assist you if you encounter difficulties in your studies.

item6.title: Consulting services
item6.text: We assist successful graduates with visa applications, university selection, and scholarship opportunities in South Korea.

gks.title: Up to 100% Grant Opportunity for Korean Universities
gks.subtitle: GKS (Global Korean Scholarship)
gks.descriptionPart1: The South Korean government's scholarship program (GKS) by the National Institute for International Education provides
gks.benefit1: Travel expenses for arrival in and departure from Korea are covered.
gks.benefit2: A one-time payment is provided for accommodation upon arrival in Korea, amounting to 200,000 Korean Won (approximately $157).
gks.benefit3: Tuition fees and language course costs are fully covered (for graduate and doctoral students)... and more

videoPlayer.description: Find out all about the GKS grant in our comprehensive video chat prepared just for you! ...

graduates.title: We assist successful graduates in choosing universities and winning grants
graduates.consultingDescription: Our academy consulting team will closely support you in choosing universities, obtaining visas, and securing grants.
graduates.moreInfo: Sign up for a free consultation to get more information!

header.title: Opportunity to Study in South Korean Universities with up to 100% Grant
header.helpText1: We help you achieve level 6 in TOPIK within 5 months
header.helpText2: Achieve a high level in TOPIK and gain opportunities to study and work in South Korea
header.freeClassInfo: Sign up for the first class for free!

register.title: Sign up for a course that suits you

intensive.title: Intensive
intensive.description: Intensive course with 1.5 hours of classes 6 days a week for those who want to master Korean thoroughly.

standard.title: Standard
standard.description: Standard Korean language classes with 1.5 hours of classes 3 days a week.

individual.title: Individual
individual.description: Individual classes with a teacher, 1.5 hours 3 days a week. Flexible schedule and individual approach.

register2.title: Have any questions?
register2.description: Leave your details, and we will contact you to answer all your questions.

topik_title: TOPIK Academy is perfect for you if you:
short_time_learning: Want to speak Korean in a short period
career_building: Want to build your career by learning Korean
grant_scholarship: Want to win a GRANT to prestigious universities in Korea with a TOPIK certificate
study_work_abroad: Want to study and work in South Korea
improve_skills: Know Korean at an intermediate level and want to improve your skills
struggle_results: Have been studying for years but still can't achieve results
